alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Houston; Peach; Pulaski; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 3:38PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pulaski, southwestern Twiggs, west central Bleckley, east central Peach and Houston Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 338 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Bonaire, or 8 miles northeast of Perry, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Perry, Warner Robins, Centerville, Byron, Robins AFB, Marion, Tarversville, Robins Air Force Base, Sand Bed, Bullard, Houston Lake, Magnolia, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Elberta, Bonaire, Kathleen and Clinchfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
